comment: Viber backups text messages only. No photos, no media... So, after restoring from backup you have text messages only (hi, I'm sending you a great shot!) but photos are missing, only ugly black squares, broken thumbnails links, etc... a complete mess! WhatsApp makes FULL chat backup on GDrive from years! So, I'm disappointed, no more than 3 points...

author: Nordric Hinds
comment: I came into contact with this app, over 5 years ago, from a close friend who's Australian. It was the best and cheapest form of communication to us and it worked effectively. Some time afterwards, I came off to use WhatsApp and that was it ever since then. However I have returned because I desire to be away from WhatsApp for good; too many distractions and nuisances.  I must say that Viber is even better than it was at last and I am really enjoying it. There are less folks here, that I know from my contact list who uses this and it's what the been looking for. The video calling could be better and the voice notes shouldn't be limited: that all that I have concerns with, but overall I'm rating it better than WhatsApp and that's according to my standards. It is really a good and stable app and the voice calls are much better than WhatsApp from my experience and in my books.   Kudos and thanks to the developers for such a great and stable app, that has been out for years and is still working towards improvements, for a better and more enjoyable experience. Keep at it, you've been doing well ever since!

author: Veronica Infante
comment: The only thing I hate is sometimes it doesn't notify me when there are new messages. I would be waiting for a reply while doing things and upon checking my phone, the led doesn't blink even if it's turned on and there's no notification but when I open the app I would see that I've already received a message. Please fix it.

author: Igor Karo
comment: Edited : "....once your data is saved to the Google Drive,  it is NO LONGER PROTECTED by the Viber encryption"!!  Hahahahaha! 😂😂😂  Finnaly the cooperation between the USA-Izrael spy network came to light.  The purpose was to justify the leaks of users private data.  They can now blame "hackers" who will "hack" Google servers in due course and who will certainly misuse this data.

author: A Google User
comment: After a few years not using Viber, I'm back, and Viber is still as bad. Not enough emoji to use, can't search history in my conversation. This app is worst than whatsapp or wechat.

author: Ivana Penava
comment: After new update, version 8.3.0, battery vibrates on every received Viber message which cause my battery to drain very fast. Please fix the problem. HTC ONE M8

reply.author: Viber Media S.à r.l.
reply.content: Hello. We have taken care of this issue and the fix will be included in our upcoming version, to be released in the very near future. If the issue persists after the update, please let us know. Thanks for your patience.

author: Milinda Bandaranayake
comment: why can't i disable vibration for messages? pls fix it. ps even after 2/3/18 update still vibration working. star rating decreased to 1

reply.author: Viber Media S.à r.l.
reply.content: Hello. We have taken care of this issue and the fix will be included in our upcoming version, to be released in the very near future. If the issue persists after the update, please let us know. Thanks for your patience.

author: A Johnson
comment: My messages only show up on my laptop and Android tablet. They do NOT show up on my Galaxy s8. I am very aggravated.

author: Liezl Ann Vitug
comment: After the latest update, the notification for back up won't disappear. Even after you back up and restore. It is really annoying. Please fix it.

author: Aladdin Fahmy
comment: It an amazing app for free vibe calls. And what's really good about it is the option of making paid calls too to landlines and mobiles around the world. I use it on phone, smart watch and tablet. Love it
I only want my LED notification light to flash and the red dots on the Viber icon to notify me. I don't want the intrusive drop down notifications that interrupt me whilst I'm doing other things.

author: Krich Bendaña
comment: Doesnt notify when theres a new message. Hassle if im using another app cause i do not know that the person already replied..pls fix this thanks

comment: After updating I can no longer use it on my tablet. It says I have to authenticate my android to use it. But it doesn't tell me how. Rhe app hangs and stays suspended.
I am not sure if it's because of the type of phone I have or my reception but at times when I am on a call, I can hardly hear the other person.

comment: All these "message your friends" notifications are too annoying! Stop doing this!

comment: Last few updates are so bad. In first time u deleted  status icon, after that u returned it but led notification lost point and now work wrong. After  that u turned on vibration on  messages. Now  led don t work and viber vibrate on messages.

author: Ilya Bas
comment: Worst messanger i've ever used. Sells your number to the advertisement companies, very slow, need to wait a lot to receive photo been sent a minute ago.

comment: After installing Viber on new phone  could t see any messages in any groups I was involved before ... so annoying! Lost so much information on time! Couldn't find.any solution for.this !

comment: It should contain the sticker as well as animation which we can  use during  video call . .. So add this things to make the app better

comment: After the new update, new messages aren't displayed on top, have to scroll down to see them.  Two more updates since but no change
Don't want everyone in my contacts to know I have Viber. I didn't give permission to give access to my contacts, but people were messaged that I am on Viber.
